oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā kitāb Sharḥ al-basmalah / li-Shaykh al-Islām Abī Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī : manuscript, [1629]
Muqaddimah fī al-basmalah wa-al-ḥamdalah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anṣārī, Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad , approximately 1423-approximately 1520
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Biqāʻī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamīd al-Dīn. (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 27 lines per pages, in black and red.

The third work in the collection dated 19 Jumadá al-Awwal 1038 AH [January 13, 1629 AD] (f. 10v) and copied in the hand of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamīd al-Dīn al-Biqāʻī. This work (Sharḥ al-basmalah) appears to be copied around the same time in the same hand.
With this is bound: Muqaddimah musammāh bi-Yāqūtat al-ʻilm / lil-Shaykh Abī Isḥāq al-Tūnisī (ff. 5r-9v) -- Qiṣṣat Maryam al-ṣāmitah, 19 Jumadá al-Awwal 1038 AH [January 13, 1629 AD] (ff. 9v-10v).
MS Arab 109. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Prayer--Islam
Islamic law--Customs and practices
Basmalah
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: هذا كتاب شرح البسملة / لشيخ الإسلام ابي يحيى زكريا الأنصاري الشافعي : مخطوطة، [1629]
مقدمة في البسملة والحمدلة
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: بقاعي، أحمد بن محمد بن أحمد بن حميد الدين. (copyist.)
